data.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: Special Enlistment [Miyako Osatani] Addition Pack / 特別参戦【小長谷ミヤコ】追加パック / 特別參戰【小長谷都子】追加包
data.detailed_description:
Expand the Special Force Valkyrie unit by recruiting [Miyako Osatani] as a playable character.

※She will join by heading to the [Ichinomiya Military Base] during Chapter 5.

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.
data.about_the_game:
Expand the Special Force Valkyrie unit by recruiting [Miyako Osatani] as a playable character.

※She will join by heading to the [Ichinomiya Military Base] during Chapter 5.

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.
data.short_description: Expand the Special Force Valkyrie unit by recruiting [Miyako Osatani] as a playable character.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

data.supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
